main event: An unidentified flying object was reported in Hackensack, New Jersey on 3 August 1947.
interesting points: The object was described as metallic and shiny., It was observed to be flying rapidly at an altitude of 200 yards., Witnesses reported a lack of visible features or sound associated with the object., The sighting lasted until the object vanished from view., There are indications that the object did not conform to known astronomical phenomena.
witness description: The witness reported an object flying very fast straight east, perceived as a bright white metallic object.
